long_description: Filtrate Oxford Sunglasses for men give you a classic shape in a handmade acetate frame for great style as well as eye protection for any sunny day of the year. High-quality polycarbonate lenses provide 100% protection from harmful UV rays and block 90% of visible light. Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight and up to 10 times more impact resistant than glass or plastic. Filtrate RAW frames are handmade of unrefined acetate so that every pair has a unique organic look and feel. Includes limited edition RAW sunglasses box and microfiber bag that doubles as a lens cleaner.
short_description: Filtrate Oxford Sunglasses for men give you a classic shape in a handmade acetate frame for great style as well as eye protection for any sunny day of the year.
